name: Infinity Chicken War
description:
Sorry but I didn't complete it, because of deadline.
So, I upload all I have done to this moment.

Video:



In the beginning of game you choose color of your army.

Then try find your campfire (with your color). You need bring eggs to your camp.

To pick up egg press E. To use it in camp press E.

If egg not in the camp it can spawn chicken. It can be your enemy (look at circle color under the chicken).
All Chickens will fight with different color. Your goal is to kill all chickens from another army and destroy threre camp.

At this time nothing will happen if you kill all enemies. But know - you win if you kill all)

To Dodge press Space.

How it relays to game theme?
Well, all chickens spawn eggs when die. So it is reincarnation thing.
Also, with right balance in this game it should be almost infinite. Because armies will reborn forever and no one will win. But in this case I have no time to balance it right.

P.S. If you die - wait. Maybe someone will bring egg in your camp and you will reborn.

P.P.S. I found bug when you reborn. I fixed it but cant reupload it. Sorry again.
